entries.title: Birth Year from Mobile Number
entries.content:
This is a clever math-based mind-reading trick that works due to the properties of numbers and multiples of 9.

The core idea is that when someone rearranges the digits of a four-digit number and subtracts, the result is always a multiple of 9. The sum of the digits of any multiple of 9 always reduces to 9 when summed repeatedly.

Why it is always 9?

Consider any four-digit number uvwx (where u, v, w and x are digits)

This number can be written mathematically as:
1000u + 100v + 10w + x

Similarly, the rearranged number xwvu can be written as:
1000x + 100w + 10v + u

Now, when we subtract these two numbers:
(1000u + 100v + 10w + x) – (1000x + 100w + 10v + u)

Rearrange terms:
(1000u – u) + (100v – 10v) + (10w – 100w) + (x – 1000x)

Factor out common terms:
999u + 90v – 90w – 999x

Since 999 and 90 are multiples of 9, the whole expression is a multiple of 9.

Thus, the difference between any two numbers formed by rearranging the same four digits will always be a multiple of 9.

By adding 16 to this sum (which is always 9), we always get 25. When they add 25 to their birth year and tell you the result, you simply subtract 25, revealing their birth year like magic!
